mapper.select: SELECT wr_humanpay_number AS wrHumanpayNumber, wr_number AS wrNumber, e_humanpay_number AS eHumanpayNumber, wr_humanpay_realcost AS wrHumanpayRealcost, wr_humanpay_date AS wrHumanpayDate FROM sp_wr_humanpay WHERE wr_humanpay_number = #{wrHumanpayNumber}

SELECT sp_wr_humanpay.wr_humanpay_number, sp_wr.wr_number, sp_e_humanpay.e_humanpay_number, sp_wr_humanpay.wr_humanpay_realcost, sp_wr_humanpay.wr_humanpay_date, sp_e_humanpay.e_humanpay_expectpay, sp_e_humanpay.e_humanpay_expectday, sp_e_humanpay.e_humanpay_name, sp_e_humanpay.e_humanpay_residentnumber FROM sp_wr_humanpay JOIN sp_wr ON sp_wr.wr_number = sp_wr_humanpay.wr_number JOIN sp_e_humanpay ON sp_e_humanpay.e_humanpay_number = sp_wr_humanpay.e_humanpay_number WHERE sp_wr.wr_number = #{wrNumber}
